member.name: T:JetBrains.ReSharper.Psi.Css.CodeStyle.CssCodeStyleSettings
member.summary: Used for storing and managing of code style settings

member.name: F:JetBrains.ReSharper.Psi.Css.Definitions.CssValueGroupType.And
member.summary: Separates two or more values all of which must occur, in any order

member.name: F:JetBrains.ReSharper.Psi.Css.Definitions.CssValueGroupType.Or
member.summary: Separates two or more alternatives: exactly one of them must occur.

member.name: F:JetBrains.ReSharper.Psi.Css.Definitions.CssValueGroupType.Any
member.summary: Separates two or more options: one or more of them must occur, in any order.

member.name: F:JetBrains.ReSharper.Psi.Css.Definitions.CssValueGroupType.All
member.summary: All of them must occur, in the given order.

member.name: T:JetBrains.ReSharper.Psi.Css.Services.MinifiedFilesFilter
member.summary: Filter out not documented files (preferes bare .css to .min.css)

member.name: M:JetBrains.ReSharper.Psi.Css.Parsing.CssMissingTokensInserter.Run(JetBrains.ReSharper.Psi.ExtensionsAPI.Tree.TreeElement)
member.remarks: This code relies that TokenStart and TokenEnd return -1 when it reaches end of file.

member.name: M:JetBrains.ReSharper.Psi.Css.CssConstantValueUtil.GetConstantValueAndUnits(JetBrains.ReSharper.Psi.Css.Tree.ICssPropertyValueExpression)
member.summary: Returns numeric value and units of literal in case literal represents number Value parsed using double.TryParse
member.returns: pair of value and units or null
